about_the_game:
Blooming Business: Casino in a few words:
  • Relaxing cozy sim-management game
  • Build, design and manage your retro casino
  • Cute animals
  • 2 modes: Story (11 missions to discover the districts of Las Venas and all its interesting characters & events) & Sandbox (Creative and Endless to let you play however you want)
  • Satisfy the needs of clients and VIPs with distinct needs and competitive goals
  • Oh and also, cute animals!!!


In this tycoon game inspired by the rise of Las Vegas in the 1950s, your mission is to revive a run-down casino, complete quests and manage your clientele for maximum profit. As you gain income and reputation you’ll advance through the casino ranks, from dusty desert to the glittering heights of Las Venas.

  • Manage your casino business and keep everyone happy, from the clients, employees to the VIP’s.
  • Build multi-floored casinos: More floors mean more space to organize your casino games.
  • Choose your hires, place breakrooms, manage your vault and deal with employees.
  • Different styles and décor will speak to different customers. Attract the right kind to keep your income and reputation high.
  • Unlock new items and bonuses for your casino using the Market Research tree. Will you rig the system or legally maximize fun?
  • Build your A team: Level up your Pitbosses to oversee your employees, increase your loyalty, engage with them, and unlock specific skills for your management.




Blooming Business: Casino is not just your standard tycoon game, you’ll progress through 11 narrative missions and face increasing challenges as you try to cater to the demanding and sometimes competing needs of the VIPs.

  • Each VIP has different skills and unique backstories that you can align with to shape your Casino business. Who will you side with?
  • Accomplish missions to get to know them. You’ll need them on your side so it will be vital to connect with them and learn their backstories to satisfy their goals and desires throughout the missions.
  • Specialize your casino and adapt your management to cater to their craziest pet peeves for big rewards! Your choices will impact their behaviours and your gameplay experience.




Play the game in one of 2 main modes:

  • The Campaign – will show you the ropes and introduce you to the VIP’s and the rich narrative landscape that makes up Las Venas. You’ll make choices here that influence how your Casino career will play out!
  • Sandbox modes – Casino types, items, decorations and Casino games are open for you to run your Casino and manage your business however you please!
Don’t play against the House, be the House…

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4096 MB) / Radeon RX 460 (4096 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The Minimum Specification listed above allows gameplay experience close to 30 FPS on average while using Low graphical settings and 1080p resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K (6 * 4100) or equivalent / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (6 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 (8192 MB) / Radeon RX 5700 XT (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The Recommended Specification listed above allows gameplay experience close to 60 FPS on average while using 1080p resolution and overall “High” graphical settings.

reviews:
“Looking for a unique business sim to get stuck into amid the sea of similar titles vying for our attention? Then Blooming Business: Casino is definitely one of the more exciting - and more accessible - games of the bunch.”
The Gamer

“It’s an in-depth business sim full of fun building variety to make your casino attractive, varied clients and employees to keep in line, and plenty of stats to track it all. The twist of VIP clients also spices up the game by throwing a wrench into your usual flow that you’ll have to work out if you want to keep the dice rolling and the drinks flowing.”
Shacknews

“The design of VIP is very interesting, little animals are not just 'cute'.”
YYSTV
short_description: Blooming Business: Casino is a relaxing management game with a narrative twist. Build and run your own fantasy casino in a bustling world full of animals and drama. Complete quests and manage your clientele. Keep everyone happy, from the clients, employees to the VIP’s.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese
